storageTypeState.Description: Locked or Unlocked. Once a machine is registered against a resource, the storageTypeState is always Locked.

crossRegionRestoreFlag.Description: Opt in details of Cross Region Restore feature.

recoveryPointType.Description: Type of the backup copy. Specifies whether it is a crash consistent backup or app consistent.

recoveryPointTime.Description: Time at which this backup copy was created.

fileShareSnapshotUri.Description: Contains Url to the snapshot of fileshare, if applicable

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

recoveryPointTimeInUTC.Description: UTC time at which recovery point was created

recoveryPointMoveReadinessInfo.Description: Eligibility of RP to be moved to another tier

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

startTime.Description: Start time of the time range for log recovery.

endTime.Description: End time of the time range for log recovery.

recoveryPointTimeInUTC.Description: UTC time at which recovery point was created

recoveryPointMoveReadinessInfo.Description: Eligibility of RP to be moved to another tier

extendedInfo.Description:
Extended Info that provides data directory details. Will be populated in two cases:
When a specific recovery point is accessed using GetRecoveryPoint
Or when ListRecoveryPoints is called for Log RP only with ExtendedInfo query filter

recoveryPointMoveReadinessInfo.Description: Eligibility of RP to be moved to another tier

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

dataDirectoryTimeInUTC.Description: UTC time at which data directory info was captured

dataDirectoryPaths.Description: List of data directory paths during restore operation.

friendlyName.Description: Friendly name of the backup copy.

recoveryPointTime.Description: Time at which this backup copy was created.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.Description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

recoveryPointTime.Description: Time at which this backup copy was created.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.Description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

sourceVMStorageType.Description: Storage type of the VM whose backup copy is created.

isSourceVMEncrypted.Description: Identifies whether the VM was encrypted when the backup copy is created.

keyAndSecret.Description: Required details for recovering an encrypted VM. Applicable only when IsSourceVMEncrypted is true.

isInstantIlrSessionActive.Description: Is the session to recover items from this backup copy still active.

isManagedVirtualMachine.Description: Whether VM is with Managed Disks

zones.Description: Identifies the zone of the VM at the time of backup. Applicable only for zone-pinned Vms

recoveryPointMoveReadinessInfo.Description: Eligibility of RP to be moved to another tier

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

kekDetails.Description: KEK is encryption key for BEK.

keyVaultId.Description: Key Vault ID where this Key is stored.

secretVaultId.Description: ID of the Key Vault where this Secret is stored.

numberOfDisksIncludedInBackup.Description: Number of disks included in backup

numberOfDisksAttachedToVm.Description: Number of disks attached to the VM

includedDiskList.Description: Information of disks included in backup

excludedDiskList.Description: Information of disks excluded from backup

crossRegionRestoreAccessDetails.Description: Access details for cross region restore

subscriptionId.Description: Subscription Id of the source vault

resourceGroupName.Description: Resource Group name of the source vault

resourceName.Description: Resource Name of the source vault

resourceId.Description: Resource Id of the source vault

coordinatorServiceStampId.Description: CoordinatorServiceStampId to be used by BCM in restore call

coordinatorServiceStampUri.Description: CoordinatorServiceStampUri to be used by BCM in restore call

protectionServiceStampId.Description: ProtectionServiceStampId to be used by BCM in restore call

protectionServiceStampUri.Description: ProtectionServiceStampUri to be used by BCM in restore call

tokenExtendedInformation.Description: Extended Information about the token like FileSpec etc.

rpOriginalSAOption.Description: Recovery point information: Original SA option

rpIsManagedVirtualMachine.Description: Recovery point information: Managed virtual machine

rpVMSizeDescription.Description: Recovery point information: VM size description

bMSActiveRegion.Description: Active region name of BMS Stamp

objectType.Description: Type of the specific object - used for deserializing

restoreFileSpecs.Description: List of Source Files/Folders(which need to recover) and TargetFolderPath details

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

fileSpecType.Description: Indicates what the Path variable stands for

targetFolderPath.Description: Destination folder path in target FileShare

targetResourceId.Description: Target file share resource ARM ID

sourceResourceId.Description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the VM on which workload that was running is being recovered.

recoveryMode.Description: Defines whether the current recovery mode is file restore or database restore

targetVirtualMachineId.Description:
This is the complete ARM Id of the target VM
For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}/provider/Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines/{vm}

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

overwriteOption.Description: Can Overwrite if Target DataBase already exists

containerId.Description: Resource Id name of the container in which Target DataBase resides

databaseName.Description: Database name InstanceName/DataBaseName for SQL or System/DbName for SAP Hana

targetDirectoryForFileRestore.Description: Target directory location for restore as files.

sourceResourceId.Description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the VM on which workload that was running is being recovered.

recoveryMode.Description: Defines whether the current recovery mode is file restore or database restore

This is the complete ARM Id of the target VM

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

shouldUseAlternateTargetLocation.Description: Default option set to true. If this is set to false, alternate data directory must be provided

isNonRecoverable.Description: SQL specific property where user can chose to set no-recovery when restore operation is tried

sourceResourceId.Description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the VM on which workload that was running is being recovered.

recoveryMode.Description: Defines whether the current recovery mode is file restore or database restore

targetVirtualMachineId.Description:
This is the complete ARM Id of the target VM
For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}/provider/Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines/{vm}

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

recoveryPointId.Description: ID of the backup copy to be recovered.

sourceResourceId.Description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the VM which is being recovered.

targetVirtualMachineId.Description:
This is the complete ARM Id of the VM that will be created.
For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}/provider/Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines/{vm}

targetResourceGroupId.Description:
This is the ARM Id of the resource group that you want to create for this Virtual machine and other artifacts.
For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}

storageAccountId.Description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the storage account to which the VM has to be restored.

virtualNetworkId.Description:
This is the virtual network Id of the vnet that will be attached to the virtual machine.
User will be validated for join action permissions in the linked access.

subnetId.Description:
Subnet ID, is the subnet ID associated with the to be restored VM. For Classic VMs it would be
{VnetID}/Subnet/{SubnetName} and, for the Azure Resource Manager VMs it would be ARM resource ID used to represent
the subnet.

targetDomainNameId.Description:
Fully qualified ARM ID of the domain name to be associated to the VM being restored. This applies only to Classic
Virtual Machines.

region.Description: Region in which the virtual machine is restored.

affinityGroup.Description: Affinity group associated to VM to be restored. Used only for Classic Compute Virtual Machines.

createNewCloudService.Description:
Should a new cloud service be created while restoring the VM. If this is false, VM will be restored to the same
cloud service as it was at the time of backup.

encryptionDetails.Description: Details needed if the VM was encrypted at the time of backup.

restoreDiskLunList.Description: List of Disk LUNs for partial restore

restoreWithManagedDisks.Description: Flag to denote of an Unmanaged disk VM should be restored with Managed disks.

diskEncryptionSetId.Description: DiskEncryptionSet's ID - needed if the VM needs to be encrypted at rest during restore with customer managed key.

zones.Description: Target zone where the VM and its disks should be restored.

identityInfo.Description: Managed Identity information required to access customer storage account.

identityBasedRestoreDetails.Description: IaaS VM workload specific restore details for restores using managed identity.

objectType.Description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

encryptionEnabled.Description: Identifies whether this backup copy represents an encrypted VM at the time of backup.

kekVaultId.Description: ID of Key Vault where KEK is stored.

secretKeyVaultId.Description: ID of Key Vault where Secret is stored.

isSystemAssignedIdentity.Description: To differentiate if the managed identity is system assigned or user assigned

managedIdentityResourceId.Description:
Managed Identity Resource Id
Optional: Might not be required in the case of system assigned managed identity

targetStorageAccountId.Description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the target storage account.

resourceId.Description: Entire ARM resource id of the resource

name.Description: Resource name associated with the resource.

type.Description: Resource type represents the complete path of the form Namespace/ResourceType/ResourceType/...

backupManagementType.Description: Backup management type to execute the current job.

duration.Description: Time elapsed during the execution of this job.

actionsInfo.Description: Gets or sets the state/actions applicable on this job like cancel/retry.

errorDetails.Description: Error details on execution of this job.

virtualMachineVersion.Description: Specifies whether the backup item is a Classic or an Azure Resource Manager VM.

recommendations.Description: List of localized recommendations for above error code.

tasksList.Description: List of tasks associated with this job.

progressPercentage.Description: Indicates progress of the job. Null if it has not started or completed.

estimatedRemainingDuration.Description: Time remaining for execution of this job.

dynamicErrorMessage.Description: Non localized error message on job execution.

taskExecutionDetails.Description:
